name: Backcountry Access Thermometer
description: This analog thermometer is a valuable snow safety tool to measure the temperature gradient of the snowpack. The 20mm-diameter dial is easy to read and covers temperatures from -40°C to 70°C.Sling included to help attach the thermometer to your skis when measuring air temperature.Thermometer sleeve protects the probe from damage.Overall length of 13.5cm.
